titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 93 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit obstruction of immigration laws by official interference.
A bill to amend chapter 93 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit obstruction of immigration laws by official interference.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 318.
